metadata.title: CVE-2024-46776 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Run DC_LOG_DC after checking link->link_enc[WHAT]The DC_LOG_DC should be run after link->link_enc is checked, not before.This fixes 1 REVERSE_INULL issue reported by Coverity.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
